body: Everytime i try to send a message it shows an error 500. I would like to know what is the problem.
body_tagged: Everytime i try to send a message it shows an error 500. I would like to know what is the problem.
title: Support@avicus Help

replies.body: Does your message get sent back to you (failure to send - error message)?
replies.body_tagged: Does your message get sent back to you (failure to send - error message)?

reply_to.body: Does your message get sent back to you (failure to send - error message)?

replies.body:
Write it like this:
support@avicus.net

No caps on the S & there is a .net at the end. Emails are caps sensitive ya know :P

replies.body: Thats not the problem. The problem is that whenever i try to send a message, the message doesnt get sent and it says 500 error.

replies.body: You don't have to use the website, you can do it from your email account as well.
